text: The Lure of the Gown is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Lure of the GownRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Marion Leonard, Harry Solter, and Florence Lawrence. ==Actors== * Marion Leonard as Isabelle * Harry Solter as Enrico * Florence Lawrence as Veronica ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Lure of the Gown
